Content: Timing makes sense. Thanks. I am not I want to hold too much back on the startup though, I'd like to share as much as possible, we'll see.

Author: Kaizyn
Content: Ask yourself this question: what is it that makes you want to visit another website?  Whatever channels you use to receive information will probably work for getting the word out to others about YOUR website.

Author: ivankirigin
Content:
Editing in something accessible online -- like Google Docs -- is just so much easier than dealing with the form.

You should write to clearly emphasize your point, and only when you're done ask yourself if you've violated the spirit of the 120 word limit.

Author: mhb
Content: I don't think the article is any more anti-environmental than it is anti-deaf people. Isn't it a benefit to the environment to point out policies which damage it when intended to help it so that they can be replaced with policies which help it?

Author: curi
Content:
I'm really curious why the downmod. Think I'm overreacting and it's good to use "fags" as slur with no context? Problem with my phrasing? Hate homosexuals? Thought "illiterate" wasn't precise enough a paraphrase? Annoyed with faint echoes of xkcd? I don't understand.

Edit: Can one of the downmodders write an explanation? Or is wanting to understand something bad here?
